findings.title: Owner can change tax, marketing, dev and liquidity fee
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to modify fees related to tax, marketing, development, and liquidity.

findings.title: Owner can change maximum transaction amount
findings.description: The owner has privileges to modify the maximum transaction amount, which could lead to potential security risks.

findings.title: Owner can exclude from maximum transaction amount
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to exclude certain addresses or users from the maximum transaction amount, which could lead to unfair advantages or manipulation.

findings.title: Owner can exclude from fee
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to exclude certain addresses or users from paying fees.

findings.title: Owner can change number of tokens to sell to add to liquidity
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to modify the number of tokens sold and added to liquidity, which may lead to unintended consequences.

findings.title: Owner can change dev and marketing addresses
findings.description: The contract owner has the privilege to modify the development and marketing addresses.

findings.title: Owner can enable after presale mode
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to enable after presale mode, which could lead to potential security risks.

findings.title: Owner Can Enable Presale Mode
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to enable presale mode with 100% transaction amount, no fee, and no swap to liquidity.

findings.title: First owner can withdraw contract BNBs
findings.description: The first owner has the ability to withdraw contract BNBs without impacting the token price.

findings.title: Owner Can Lock and Unlock Contract
findings.description: The owner can temporarily relinquish ownership and restore it after a set time.
